actions: Write {who} observation of the state contained between <state> and </state>.
Write a short description of each action available to {who} in this state.
state: Write {who} observation of the state contained between <state> and </state>.
As a result of this action, write {who2} observation of the state contained between <state> and </state>.
action_select: Write {who} observation of the state contained between <state> and </state>.
Write a short description of each action available to you in this state and number each line.
Write exactly the number of the action you are taking.
self_eval: Write {who} observation of the state contained between <state> and </state>.
Is this a good action? yes/no.
goal: Write {who} observation of the state contained between <state> and </state>.s
Will you eventually win from this position? yes/no
terminal: Write {who} observation of the state contained between <state> and </state>.
prefix: Write your observation of the state contained between <state> and </state>.
Will you eventually win from this position? yes/no.
Write a short description of each action available to you in this state and number each line.
Write exactly the number of the action you are taking.
Is this a good action? yes/no
